name: ColorWheel (vamsikrd)
description:
It is a simple colour match game.

The player needs to make sure that the ball needs to hit/land on the same triangle colour as the ball.

Instructions:

1. Tap the left portion of the screen to rotate the wheel anti-clockwise.

2. Tap the right portion of the screen to rotate the wheel clockwise.

3. Tilt the phone towards the left to move the wheel to left.

4. Tilt the phone towards the right to move the wheel to right.

5.  Make sure that the ball needs to hit/land on the same triangle colour as the ball.

6. Correct hit increases the score by one, Wrong hit decreases the score by one.

7. Use the settings to customise the properties of the game.

Note: The game is in development.
